      Diamonds balance :
      What are Diamonds?
      Diamonds are points that you earn when you shop. They can be used to get cashback on future purchases.
      How do I earn Diamonds?
      You earn Diamonds on most purchases. You can see how many Diamonds you will earn on the product page.
      How do I use Diamonds?
      When you make a purchase, we will automatically convert any Diamonds you have into cashbacks to your Amazon Pay balance.
      10 Diamonds = ₹1 cashback

      About this item

      • Changeable stick caps, remappable inputs and custom settings make your DualSense Edge wireless controller uniquely yours. Fine tune your aim by adjusting stick sensitivity and dead zones, set the travel distance of your triggers for faster inputs, and quickly swap between control profiles so you’re always ready for your next game.
      • Swappable back buttons can be configured to any other button input, so you’ve always got game-changing actions and essential controls at your fingertips. Plus, with two different styles of button to choose from, you can pick an input type that feels just right for your playstyle.
      • Enjoy all the immersive features of the DualSense wireless controller and our signature controller comfort. Experience varying force and tension at your fingertips with adaptive triggers, and feel your in-game actions and environment simulated through haptic feedback.*
      • Play for longer with swappable replacement stick modules available to purchase separately. *Haptic feedback and adaptive trigger features available when supported by game.

            How are ratings calculated?
            To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyses reviews to verify trustworthiness.

            Customers say

            Customers find this controller to be a premium gaming device with interchangeable thumbsticks and back buttons, and one customer notes it can hold up more than a console generation. They appreciate its customization options, with the ability to create up to 3-4 profiles, and like its functionality and sensitivity adjustments. However, the battery life receives mixed reviews, with several customers noting it's on the lower side, and opinions on value are divided between those who find it worth the price and those who consider it too costly.

                • Aakshat Paandey
                  3.0 out of 5 stars PS5 DualSense Edge Controller
                  Reviewed in India on 19 September 2024
                  Verified Purchase
                  I recently purchased the PS5 DualSense Edge controller, and as a user experience designer and avid gamer, I was eager to see how it compared to the original DualSense. Here’s my take!

                  Pros:

                  Customization: The ability to remap buttons and adjust sensitivity settings is fantastic. It really allows you to tailor the controller to your play style, making the gaming experience feel more personal.
                  Ergonomics: The design is a step up—very comfortable to hold, even during long sessions. I noticed less hand fatigue, which is a huge plus.
                  Immersive Feedback: The improved tactile feedback and adaptive triggers enhance immersion. Every action feels more impactful, adding depth to gameplay.
                  Cons:

                  Price: At ₹18,000, this controller is nearly 3x the cost of the original DualSense. While I appreciate the enhancements, I honestly believe it should be priced closer to ₹10,000. The high cost makes it feel a bit exclusive, and I think many gamers might be hesitant to invest at this price point.
                  Overall, the DualSense Edge offers some great improvements, but the steep price tag holds it back from being a must-have. If you’re considering the upgrade, weigh the benefits against your budget.

                  Hope this helps fellow gamers make an informed decision!

                  Aakshat Paandey
                  3.0 out of 5 stars
                  PS5 DualSense Edge Controller

                  Reviewed in India on 19 September 2024
                  I recently purchased the PS5 DualSense Edge controller, and as a user experience designer and avid gamer, I was eager to see how it compared to the original DualSense. Here’s my take!

                  Pros:

                  Customization: The ability to remap buttons and adjust sensitivity settings is fantastic. It really allows you to tailor the controller to your play style, making the gaming experience feel more personal.
                  Ergonomics: The design is a step up—very comfortable to hold, even during long sessions. I noticed less hand fatigue, which is a huge plus.
                  Immersive Feedback: The improved tactile feedback and adaptive triggers enhance immersion. Every action feels more impactful, adding depth to gameplay.
                  Cons:

                  Price: At ₹18,000, this controller is nearly 3x the cost of the original DualSense. While I appreciate the enhancements, I honestly believe it should be priced closer to ₹10,000. The high cost makes it feel a bit exclusive, and I think many gamers might be hesitant to invest at this price point.
                  Overall, the DualSense Edge offers some great improvements, but the steep price tag holds it back from being a must-have. If you’re considering the upgrade, weigh the benefits against your budget.

                  Hope this helps fellow gamers make an informed decision!
